hiveArticle.body:
My entry for the ColorChallenge by @kalemandra

I have clicked few pictures of the sunset at Indiranagar, Bangalore, India. Clicked using Nokia 6 Back Camera (13 MP f/2.0 1/555 3.57mm ISO100)

![IMG_20170901_182554.jpg](https://steemitimages.com/DQmZ8e4BycLYBiYbBCLGTWedTy6wU9nN46SfxNP7azjDUy3/IMG_20170901_182554.jpg)

![IMG_20170901_183837.jpg](https://steemitimages.com/DQmTyChHLzLeoRUCDQ5xLnc1shN3khsQ9Yx46C1Z8pQRyA3/IMG_20170901_183837.jpg)

The Collage of all the pictures together.

![20170902_222619-COLLAGE.jpg](https://steemitimages.com/DQmRSdEULRPkAJL2QVAVaTHZ58Fc48nVC6YPuD6DrZz8ghq/20170902_222619-COLLAGE.jpg)
